content: this pattern is also available for free on my blog 1 cilantro tea towel is worked in three sections - a seed stitch bottom border followed with a thin stockinette stripe and lots of hurdle stitch as the main part it s a simple and quick knit creating texture using just knit and purl stitches the tea towel will make lovely kitchen decor for you or as a housewarming gift for a close one this pattern has been tech edited and test knit **sizes** one size - width 35 cm 14 length 42 cm 16 5 **materials** **yarn ** 170 m 186 yds of 24/7 cotton lion brand yarns - 100% cotton 170 m 186 yds per 100g or similar worsted weight category 4 - medium yarn sample worked in colorway camel **needles ** 5 mm us 8 straight or circular needles 80 - 100 cm 32 - 40 or to fit gauge **other ** tapestry needle 1 https //whileberry com/blog/cilantro-tea-towel-free-knitting-pattern
